basic.description:
The lands and peoples of South America, emphasizing how the colonial experience continues to affect contemporary life in the region.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;24O;60P)
basic.subject: GPHY
basic.title: The Geography of South America

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of GPHY101 or GPHY102 or Level 2 in a DEVS plan or permission of the department.
